title: St. George's S.C.
text:
St. George's Sports Club is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> team founded in 1962 in <a href="Buff%20Bay%2C%20Jamaica">Buff Bay</a>, <a href="Portland%2C%20Jamaica">Portland</a> Jamaica, founded in 1962 in the top-flight <a href="National%20Premier%20League">Jamaica National Premier League</a>. The home ground of the club is Lynch Park which is situated by the shoreline of the north coast in the city of <a href="Buff%20Bay%2C%20Jamaica">Buff Bay</a>, <a href="Portland%2C%20Jamaica">Portland</a>.
St George's clinched promotion to the top level in June 2007 and are the first team from Portland to grace the Premier League since Taurus in the early 1990s. They returned to the NPL after more than 19 years. After relegation in the 2012 season, the club has gone throw several processes of rebuilding to attain a position in the Premier League.
At the start of the 2018–2019 season, a new management structure was established.
